sentences.english: There is no threat or force involved.
sentences.chinese: 它不涉及任何威脅或者武力。

sentences.english: The white racists tried to keep down the Indians by force.
sentences.chinese: 白人種族主義者企圖用武力壓服印第安人。

sentences.english: We have consistently called for settling international disputes by peaceful means and opposed the use of force.
sentences.chinese: 我們一貫主張和平解決國際爭端，反對使用武力。

sentences.english: The junta has threatened to use force, and the NMSP no longer trusts the generals.
sentences.chinese: 軍政府威脅要使用武力，新孟邦黨不再信任將軍們。

sentences.english: The Thai government has no intention of closing the Thai-Cambodia border and will not use military force to deal with this bilateral problem, he said.
sentences.chinese: 但他表示泰國不會關閉兩國邊境或動用武力解決問題。

sentences.english: If other means fail , we shall resort to force.
sentences.chinese: 如果其他手段均失敗，我們就將訴諸武力。

sentences.english: General Iland said that the use of force was the only way to stop the flotilla.
sentences.chinese: 愛朗將領說，阻止船隊前進的唯一方法就是使用武力。

sentences.english: These were “troublemakers”, and the government had every right to use force.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是“造事分子”，政府完全有權使用武力。

sentences.english: Grand-scale maneuvers are means of non-violent use of power.
sentences.chinese: 大規模的演習是非武力運用的方式。

sentences.english: "Chinalco is using force to win approval of its project, " Ancietasays.
sentences.chinese: “中鋁在用武力來贏得這項工程的許可，”安奇塔說。

sentences.english: He wondered about the show of force.
“The sultan came to power by force of arms, carried out against his father with British help, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 卡布斯用武力奪取政權，得到了英國人的幫助。

sentences.english: They say the pen is mightier than the sword.
He realizes that force of arms is still a possibility for unseating him.
sentences.chinese: 他說，“他意識到自己也可能被武力所推翻。”

sentences.english: Force is all-conquering, but its victories are short-lived.
sentences.chinese: 武力是可以什麼都征服，但是它的勝利卻是短命的。

sentences.english: But what kind of a utopia is it which is kept by force?
sentences.chinese: 但這是那門子的烏托邦，要靠武力維持？
